stats.yearlyProjectionDescription: This is an estimate based on your current active subscriptions. As subscription prices change or you add new subscriptions, this projection will automatically update.

settings.securityPoint1Text: All your subscription data is stored securely on your device. We don't send your personal information to any third parties.
settings.securityPoint2Text: Your photos, subscription details, and personal information remain private and are never shared with external services.
settings.securityPoint3Text: Your account is protected with industry-standard encryption and secure authentication methods.
settings.aboutText: Sub-Tracking helps you manage all your subscriptions in one place. Track your monthly spending, get reminders for upcoming payments, and never miss a renewal date again.
settings.aboutText2: Our mission is to make subscription management simple, transparent, and stress-free. Take control of your recurring expenses and make informed decisions about your subscriptions.
settings.feature1: Track all your subscriptions in one place
settings.feature2: Monitor your monthly and yearly spending
settings.feature3: Get insights into your subscription patterns
settings.contactDescription: We're working on a way for you to reach us directly from the app. Stay tuned!
settings.notificationsDescription: We're building a smart notification system to remind you about upcoming payments and renewals.
settings.deleteLocalDataMessage: Are you sure you want to delete all local data? This will log you out and reset the app.
